attributes.comment:
I would like to comment on the proposed fee increase for visa petitions. While there is a need for
increased numbers of adjudicators, those who will be paying these increase fees at the moment
will not be the ones seeing lowered processing time. I would be in favor of a graduated fee
increase, where each year the fee is raised. In addition there is currently a significant discrepency
in processing times between service centers for some visas. For instance the I-129F is being
processed around 2 months faster through Vermont than through California. A redistribution of
petitions could also help with processing times. Overall, a drastic increase in fees immediately
implemented, the effects of which would not be seen for those currently effected makes no sense.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Holly D. Lang
